title: Bug 18268 not finding images and files in NL-specific subdirectories
description:
When starting Eclipse, if the <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/eclipselg.gif> file is deleted and the value of the aboutImage property in <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/about.ini> is changed to 'aboutImage=$nl$/eclipselg.gif', the UI correctly passes the entire path to IPluginDescriptor.find, but the '$nl$' path segment is not handled correctly. This results in the main image not being displayed in the about dialog. This issue can be reproduced by following these steps:
1. Start Eclipse.
2. Delete the <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/eclipselg.gif> file.
3. Edit the <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/about.ini> file and change the value of the aboutImage property to 'aboutImage=nl/en/eclipselg.gif'.
4. Open the about dialog.
OB: Observe: There is a main image displayed in the about dialog.
EB:
Open the about dialog.
Observe: There is no main image displayed.
Expectation: The main image should have been found in the specified location.
SR: The issue pertains to the handling of the '$nl$' path segment when passing the path to IPluginDescriptor.find. This needs to be investigated and resolved to ensure that images are correctly found in NL-specific subdirectories.
